patthana13.15:1.1_0: Micchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namicchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.15:1.1_1: Micchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Micchattaniyataṁ
patthana13.15:1.1_2: dhammaṁ paṭicca naaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Micchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ
patthana13.15:1.1_3: paṭicca nasammattaniyato ca naaniyato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Micchattaniyataṁ
patthana13.15:1.1_4: dhammaṁ paṭicca namicchattaniyato ca nasammattaniyato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.15:2.1_0: Sammattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sammattaniyataṁ
patthana13.15:2.1_1: dhammaṁ paṭicca namicchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sammattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ
patthana13.15:2.1_2: paṭicca naaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sammattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namicchattaniyato
patthana13.15:2.1_3: ca naaniyato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Sammattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namicchattaniyato
patthana13.15:2.1_4: ca nasammattaniyato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.15:3.1: Aniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namicchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana13.15:4.1: Micchattaniyatañca aniyatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca namicchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana13.15:5.1: Sammattaniyatañca aniyatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca namicchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana13.15:6.1: Hetuyā ekūnavīsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate ekūnavīsa. (Sabbattha vitthāretabbaṁ.)
